WARNING.APP-LICENSE-ISSUE-INVALID: Alfresco Process Services is in read-only mode as the local license is invalid.
WARNING.APP-LICENSE-ISSUE-NOT-FOUND: Alfresco Process Services is in read-only mode since no local license could be found.
WARNING.APP-LICENSE-ISSUE-INVALID-DATE: Alfresco Process Services is in read-only mode as the dates of the local license are not valid (either expired or has a start date that is in the future).
WARNING.APP-LICENSE-WARNING-ABOUT-TO-EXPIRE: Your license is about to expire. Alfresco Process Services will become read-only.

ERROR.UNKNOWN: An error occurred while performing the requested operation.
ERROR.BAD_REQUEST: An error occurred while performing the requested operation
ERROR.NOT_FOUND: The resource you are trying to access does not exist
ERROR.UNAUTHORIZED: You should sign in in order to perform the requested operation.
ERROR.FORBIDDEN: You are not allowed to perform the requested operation
ERROR.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred while performing the requested operation.

TENANT-MGMT.NO-SELECTION: Select a tenant from the list on the left
TENANT-MGMT.LOGO: The users of this tenant will see the following header. Click on it to change the logo.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-VERSION-HELP: Select the version of your Alfresco repository.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-VERSION-HELP-40: You are using an Alfresco version that requires the 'Alfresco tenant' field above to be explicitly filled in. You can find the value for the tenant field by visiting the Alfresco Share's 'Admin Console' and navigate to 'Repository > Repository Descriptor (Current)' and copy the value for 'ID'.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-VERSION-HELP-40-ADMIN-CONSOLE-L: Click the link below to visit the 'Admin Console'
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-TENANT-HELP: Tenant name to use in Alfresco. When omitted, the default tenant (-default-) is assumed
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-URL-HELP: Base URL for Alfresco repository install, for example: https://my-domain.com/alfresco
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SHARE-URL-HELP: Base URL for Alfresco Share install, for example: https://my-domain.com/share. Used to generate links to view content in an Alfresco repository.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SHARE-CONNECTOR-HELP: Select if you are using the Alfresco Share connector
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-SECRET-HELP: Specify if using the Alfresco Share connector. Will allow Alfresco Process Services to communicate with Alfresco without creating Alfresco user accounts in Alfresco Process Services for each user.
TENANT-MGMT.ALFRESCO-REPO-NONE: No Alfresco repositories configured for this tenant.

POPUP.CREATE-MAX-USERS: Maximum allowed users in this tenant
POPUP.DELETE-TITLE: Are you sure you want to remove this tenant?

POPUP.ALFRESCO-REPO-DELETE-MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the Alfresco Repository {{name}}? Existing content from the repository will still be available but no new content can be linked or imported using this repository.

EVENT.LAST-NAME-CHANGE: User "{{userName}}" has changed last name: from "{{originalLastName}}" to "{{newLastName}}"

POPUP.DELETE-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This will delete all sub groups too.
POPUP.DELETE-MEMBER-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete "{{userToRemove.firstName}} {{userToRemove.lastName}}" from the group?
POPUP.DELETE-CAPABILITY-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this capability from the group?

FUNCTIONAL-GROUP-MGMT.NO-SELECTION: Select a group from the list on the left
FUNCTIONAL-GROUP-MGMT.USER-ADDED: Users have been added to group
FUNCTIONAL-GROUP-MGMT.INACTIVE-DESCRIPTION: This group has been deactivated. Users will still be able complete currently assigned tasks to this group, but new process definitions cannot use this group anymore.

POPUP.DELETE-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this deactivated group? This will delete all subgroups, and new tasks assigned to this group or its subgroups will not be found using the regular search filters.
POPUP.DEACTIVATE-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this group? All sub groups will also be deleted. A group will first be deactivated, so that process tasks can be completed. Clicking the Removal button a second time will delete the group completely.
POPUP.DELETE-MEMBER-DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete "{{userToRemove.fullname}}" from the group?
POPUP.ACTIVATE-DESCRIPTION: Activate this group again? This means that this group would again be eligible for task assignment. Note that subgroups of a group are not activated by default.
